definition: in view of this/to this end
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
example/mirror/to view/reflection/to reflect/to inspect/to warn/(ancient bronze mirror)
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: In view of this situation, the thesis is to explore the linguistic obstacle: foregrounded linguistic features.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，前景化语言特征便成为本论文的研究对象。

sentences.english: In that spirit, I made my own list of 10 relationship no-no’s.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，我列举出来我的人际关系的10条大忌。

sentences.english: For that reason, our valuation work has always erred on the side of conservatism.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，我们的价值化工作常常失之于保守。

sentences.english: In view of this, we can foresee a bright future for geomancy in America.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，我们可以预见风水在美国将大有可为。

sentences.english: So I decided to figure out what the essence of my personal philosphy was.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，我决定先找出我个人哲学的精髓。

sentences.english: So Aflac started offering flexible schedules and job sharing.
sentences.chinese: 有鉴于此，该公司开始实行灵活的工作时间和轮班制。
